pages.md:
# IMAGE QUALITY SETTING (Movie Recording)

## WHITE BALANCE
Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (see page 136).

## DYNAMIC RANGE
Choose a dynamic range for movie recording.

| Option | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| 100%   | See "DYNAMIC RANGE" (page 140). |
| 200%   | |
| 400%   | |

- **AUTO** (automatic dynamic range control) is not available during movie recording.
- **200%** is available at sensitivities from ISO 320 to ISO 12800.
- **400%** at sensitivities from ISO 640 to 12800.
- This item is available when F-Log/HLG is selected for **MOVIE SETTING > F-Log/HLG RECORDING**.

## TONE CURVE
Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (see page 141).

## COLOR
Options are the same as those for still photography, but settings must be adjusted separately (see page 141).
